headline: How the Narrative Surrounding Mercedes-Benz Has Shifted Amid Upgraded Targets and Persistent Risks
summary: Mercedes-Benz Group’s fair value estimate has nudged higher to about €62.76 per share, while the discount rate and revenue growth outlook remain essentially unchanged, signaling a cautiously more constructive view on intrinsic worth rather than a wholesale shift in fundamentals. The modest uplift reflects a market narrative that is being recalibrated in response to stronger perceived balance sheet resilience and premium brand durability, even as macro risks and competitive pressures persist...
